architecture.augmentations

Interface Item

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Consumable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Armor, Equipment, NominalPotion, Potion, RecoveryPotion, Weapon

    public interface Item
    Represents items, things held by some monsters and stored in chests and player inventories. Specific types of items include equipment, potions, etc.
